### Procurement Overview

The Canadian Grain Commission has a requirement for the purchase, on-site delivery, and installation of 200 fully articulating dual monitor arms, as well as the removal of existing dual monitor arms. The requirement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and is not subject to international trade agreements.

### Delivery Schedule

The procurement aims to have the initial delivery of 200 units completed by December 21, 2023. Additional deliveries of up to 200 units can be made over a period of 24 months, subject to the requirements of the Canadian Grain Commission.

### Bid Submission

This procurement is subject to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C. Bidders are required to submit a bid in accordance with the bid solicitation document, which can be found at the following URL [insert URL]. The bid submission deadline is 2023-10-23T15:00:00.

### Suppliers

This procurement is reserved for Indigenous businesses under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
